welcomeHeading: Welcome to Qingdao Lolin Mech Inc.
heading: Privacy Policy
welcomeText: We take the protection of your personal data seriously. This Privacy Policy outlines the types of data we may collect, the purpose for which it is used, and your rights regarding your data when using our website.

sections.title: 1. Controller Information
sections.content:
Company: Qingdao Lolin Mech Inc.
Address: 34-3-202, Luxin Spring Garden, No. 1 East Yinchuan Road, Qingdao, China
Email: haichuanyu@lolinmetals.com
Phone: +86-532-81928971

sections.title: 2. Scope of Application
sections.content: This Privacy Policy applies to the use of our website and the services provided through it. It does not apply to any third-party websites that may be linked to from our site.

sections.title: 3. Data We Do Not Collect
sections.content: Our website is purely informational. We do not collect any personal data such as names, email addresses, or IP addresses for marketing or analytics purposes. There are no contact forms, newsletter subscriptions, or user accounts.

sections.title: 4. Cookies
sections.content: This website uses only technically essential cookies. These are required to ensure proper display and functionality of the website. We do not use cookies for tracking, analytics, or advertising. No personal data is stored or shared via cookies.

sections.title: 5. Server Log Files
sections.content: When visiting the website, the hosting provider may automatically collect certain technical information (e.g., browser type, operating system, referring URL, access time) and store it in server log files. This data is anonymized and is used solely for technical monitoring and security purposes.

sections.title: 6. No Sharing with Third Parties
sections.content: We do not sell, rent, or share your personal data with any third parties unless required by law or legal proceedings.

sections.title: 7. Data Security
sections.content: We take reasonable technical and organizational measures to ensure your data is protected from unauthorized access, modification, or disclosure. However, since our website does not store or process personal data, there is minimal risk to your data privacy.

sections.title: 8. International Data Transfers
sections.content: As our servers may be located outside of your home country, technical data may be transferred internationally. However, since we do not collect personal data, no personally identifiable information is involved in such transfers.

sections.title: 9. Your Rights
sections.content: Even though we do not store personal data, you have the right to request information about any data that may be associated with you, and to request correction or deletion where applicable. You can contact us at haichuanyu@lolinmetals.com.

sections.title: 10. Updates to this Policy
sections.content: We may update this Privacy Policy occasionally to reflect legal changes or improve clarity. Please review this page periodically for the latest information.
